game.name: The Apollo Project
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In The Apollo Project, you must survive against men and nature itself before it's too late. Harness the power of an alien artifact to infiltrate a top secret research facility to save the world from impending climate disaster. Can you make it out alive before it's too late?
game.shortDescriptionEn: In The Apollo Project, you must survive against men and nature itself before it's too late. Harness the power of an alien artifact to infiltrate a top secret research facility to save the world from impending climate disaster. Can you make it out alive before it's too late?
